post:
![](http://i.imgur.com/IKTjJFo.png)
# Welcome to a new Fresh Network,  

We are here with some new budget shared hosting offers.   
In 3 premium locations. All plans come with a Vesta Control Panel.

FreshNetworks started in 2015,to provide top and quality web hosting services.  
Our services are housed on our fantastic and fast infrastructure, connected to an 1Gbit connection, giving your website the boost it needs to perform in the online world.  
We have optimised our web servers for your piece of mind. We use the latest technologies in all our services to keep your site safe.


## **Nano**  
* 25GB Bandwidth  
* 1 MySQL Database  
* 10 Mail Accounts  
* 1GB HDD   
* Shared IP (Read below for dedicated)   
* _**€1.50/year**_  
*  [Order in Jacksonville](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=3)  
*  [Order in Amsterdam](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=7)  
*  [Order in Dallas](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)  


## **Micro**  
* 50GB Bandwidth  
* 2 MySQL Database  
* 20 Mail Accounts  
* 2GB HDD   
* Shared IP (Read below for dedicated)   
* _**€2.50/year**_  
*  [Order in Jacksonville](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=4)  
*  [Order in Amsterdam](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)  
*  [Order in Dallas](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)  


## **Standard**  (Not available in Dallas)
* 75GB Bandwidth  
* 3 MySQL Database  
* 30 Mail Accounts  
* 3GB HDD   
* Shared IP   
* _**€3.50/year**_  
*  [Order in Jacksonville](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=5)  
*  [Order in Amsterdam](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=9)  


## **Mega**   (Not available in Dallas)
* 75GB Bandwidth  
* 3 MySQL Database  
* 30 Mail Accounts  
* 3GB HDD
* Shared IP    
* _**€3.50/year**_  
*  [Order in Jacksonville](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=6)  
*  [Order in Amsterdam](http://freshnetworks.co/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=10)  

Our VestaCP has been modified and redesigned to provide a new feel to our customers.
All Shared Hosting packages are deployed after payment. Our Dallas plans are limited and are SSD disks.  
## The first two users to purchase in the Dallas location will receive a dedicated IP address :) (for as little as €1.50/year!)  
## The first 5 users to purchase in the Jacksonville or Amsterdam location will get a extra 2GB HDD
Test IPs are available via PM or support ticket.  

Any questions reply, PM or send a ticket :)
